solution_line_template: Miles's collection has {miles_total_pages} pages because {miles_height_inches} x {miles_pages_per_inch} = <<{miles_height_inches}*{miles_pages_per_inch}={miles_total_pages}>>{miles_total_pages}

Daphne's collection has {daphne_total_pages} pages because {daphne_height_inches} x {daphne_pages_per_inch} = <<{daphne_height_inches}*{daphne_pages_per_inch}={daphne_total_pages}>>{daphne_total_pages}
The largest collection has {daphne_total_pages} pages because {daphne_total_pages} > {miles_total_pages}
